reviews.comment:
Travelled home late Friday night from work and had a burst tyre. I initially booked a refit with a company who said they could do next day however the job was still waiting to be farmed out to a mechanic early this morning. I checked Google again and found this lovely lad Dean üôè. I called him and he was with me within the hour all sorted and road worthy again.

I would absolutely recommend this young man ,who is a complete professional in his field, mannerly and genuine .

Needless to say he is now listed in my contacts for future jobs and recommendations to friends .

Thank you !

reviews.comment:
I had a slashed tyre emergency in a remote area, early morning and it was cold standing away fom my vehicle to get a phone signal. Dean from Tyre Emergency was fantastic. He sourced my a new tyre in no time, send me his location so I could track his progress, and reassured my all the way that all will be fine.
Dean was certainly my angel that morning.  He was professional, kind and very efficient in his job.
If ever I need an energy tyre again I will cobtact Tyre Emergency immediate
